Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
ehavior (Behavioral Data Directory)

• Core content: Animal task performance records (e.g., licking, pressing, choice-making), movement trajectories, head orientation, video frames, event timestamps, task metadata and annotations

• Purpose: Correlate neural activity with behavioral performance; support research on behavior-neural coding and decision-making mechanisms

• Common formats: NWB, CSV, video files, behavioral log files

fmost (fMOST Data Directory, fMOST=Fluorescent Micro-Optical Sectioning Tomography)

• Core content: Raw whole-brain fluorescence imaging data, 3D reconstructed volumes, morphological and distribution data of cells/blood vessels/nerve fibers, brain region registration templates

• Purpose: Neuronal morphology analysis, neural circuit tracing, whole-brain connectome research

• Common formats: TIFF/OME-TIFF, 3D volume data, segmentation and annotation files

ecephy (Extracellular Electrophysiology Directory, ecephys=Extracellular Electrophysiology)

• Core content: Raw voltage signals from multi-channel electrodes (e.g., Neuropixels), spike detection and sorting results, local field potentials (LFP), stimulus/behavior synchronization timestamps, elect

Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We use the aws cli tool to download data from AWS, cut the data into appropriate sizes and package them into car files, and finally send them to SP via http/hard disk mail.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, North America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
